original_text: Do you not know, brothers and sisters—for I am speaking to those who know the law—that the law has authority over someone only as long as that person lives?
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 법 아는 자들에게 말하노니 너희는 그 법이 사람이 살 동안만 그를 주관하는 줄 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: Do you not know, brothers and sisters—
for I am speaking to those who know the law—
that the law has authority over someone
sentences.korean_translation: 율법이 어떤 사람에게 권세를 가지는 것은

sentences.original_text: only as long as that person lives?
